name: Jason
summary: An experienced software engineer with a strong track record of developing and delivering products. Constantly seeks innovative solutions to everyday problems in a fast-paced environment. A quick learner and intensely interested in software development, project management, data analysis, and business process analysis. Eager to develop new skills while maximizing critical and analytical skills to make meaningful contributions to the organization.

works.title: Software Engineer
works.description:
• Responsible for the order marketplace backend system, especially in billing and settlement
  • Design and implement services in a microservices architecture to ensure quality, reliability, and compliance
  • Provide high performance, availability, and scalability services to process the high volume of requests
  • Write high-quality production code in Go and build robust workflows for systematic monitoring
  • Integrates in-depth data analysis knowledge with a solid understanding of business and industry practices
  • Support on-call to help with operational issues and dive into the deep layer of code to identify and solve problems
  • Partner with IT Security and DevOps team to implement application security testing (SAST & DAST) across services
  • Partner with data team to democratize AI & big data across modules and technology teams
  • Involved in cost optimization by conducting R&D, with cost-saving results of up to USD 256,000 annually
  • In charge of the post-acquisition migration and integration for the billing and settlement modules

works.title: Senior Programmer
works.description:
• Provide technical leadership in a fast-moving environment and write high-quality code, mainly in Java and .NET
  • Partner with system administrators, business, and legal teams to ensure compliance and manage the risk factors
  • Responsible for the core system, including in financial and payment infrastructure
  • Collaborate with external parties and be a point of contact for system production and technical issues
  • Analyze business requirements and coordinate the development and release planning across multiple projects
  • Apply deep knowledge of products, technologies, and businesses to build the solutions
  • Assist and in-depth code review to maintain high development standards
  • Deploy, monitor, and maintain a high standard of delivery quality
  • Support the complex technical issues and mentor mid and junior programmers

works.title: Programmer
works.description:
• Manage and coordinate the full development lifecycle (enhancement and new project)
  • Work closely with analysts, operation team, and business stakeholders to build a new solution
  • Create development standards, implement advanced design patterns and test-driven development (TDD)
  • In-depth code review to promote modularization and maintain high development standards
  • Perform, debug, and fix frontend or backend bugs to any issues or tickets that arise
  • Develop a clear user manual and train users

works.title: Junior Programmer
works.description:
• Responsible for the core system, mostly using Java, .NET, and Oracle ERP
  • Develop and maintain the frontend and backend of Oracle-based applications
  • Perform R&D and conduct proof of concept for a new solution
  • Drive automation, testing, and tooling to improve data quality

education.description:
• Master track program, the beginning of master's studies intersect with the preparation of the bachelor's thesis
  • Honor: magna cum laude
  • GPA: 3.88/4.0

certifications.name: Google IT Automation with Python Specialization
From Data to Insights with Google Cloud Specialization

voluntaries.organization: Bangkit Academy by Google, GoTo, Tokopedia, Traveloka
voluntaries.description:
• Conducted online instructor-led training (ILT) with approx. 50 university students across Indonesia in each session that consists of theory and hands-on materials
  • Impart industrial knowledge of data and machine learning technology and implementation
  • Facilitated online collaboration and mentoring sessions for capstone project
  • Prioritized critical aspects of machine learning projects, identifying key areas for teams to concentrate on for maximum impact
  • Offered actionable feedback and technical advice to enhance the quality of machine learning models and implementation
  • Help students reach global standards and qualifications

voluntaries.organization: Developer Student Club Binus University - Google Developer Student Club
voluntaries.description:
• Impart knowledge of backend technologies, including theory and Node.js' hands-on
  • Arrange and assess project assignment

• Assigned for Chinese Taipei NOC
  • Worked under Chef de Mission (CdM) assignment
  • Facilitated communication
  • Provided information, administration, and assistance support
  • Assisted during team welcoming ceremony (TWC) & opening & closing ceremony (OCC)
  • Duties as requested by the NOCs
